name: Biosecurity program; establishment
text:
BIOSECURITY PROGRAM
 
Note
 
  Biosecurity program; progress report to 2018 legislature.  L 2017, c 163, §4.
  Invasive species management requirements, including interisland and export database for agricultural commodities.  L 2016, c 243, §3.
 
         The department shall establish a biosecurity program authorized under this chapter that shall interface with other relevant state law; provided that the biosecurity program is not inconsistent with federal law. [L 2008, c 236, pt of §2]
